channel.title: compiler---WORKING FOR NEW UPDATE
channel.description:
Ok many of you are having trouble with your compilers am i right??? well heres ur soloution
[code]@echo off title Nofears Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_04\bin/java.exe" server pause [/code]
Thats the code, after its done it will open your server
I will try to post more updates for the updates
POST BUGS IF NOT WORKING I WILL TRY TO GET IT FIXED ASAP!!!
